title: Business Analyst
tagsAndSkills: Usage,Business Analyst,Functional testing,Equity,UAT,Functional analysis,Test cases,User acceptance testing
jobDescription:
• Work with stakeholders to understand and document requirements related to settlements and capital markets
  • Capture and translate business needs into detailed functional specifications
  • Analyze and model business processes related to settlements and equity operations
  • Develop functional specifications and use cases for system enhancements and new features
  • Provide expert knowledge on settlements, capital markets, and trading processes
  • Act as the primary SME for issues and queries related to settlements and equity front and back office operations
  • Design and execute test plans to ensure settlement processes and systems meet business requirements
  • Conduct functional testing and support user acceptance testing (UAT)
  • Identify, document, and resolve defects in collaboration with development teams
  • Communicate effectively with business users, IT teams, and other stakeholders to ensure alignment on requirements and solutions
  • Provide regular updates on project status, risks, and issues
  • Maintain comprehensive documentation of requirements, functional specifications, test cases, and user guides
  • Ensure all documentation is accurate and up-to-date
  • TECHNICAL SKILLS: Expertise in settlements and capital markets
  • Functional analysis and requirements gathering
  • Equity front and back office operations
  • Testing and defect management

title: Assistant Manager/Deputy Manager
tagsAndSkills: Team
jobDescription:
We are hiring Assistant Manager/ Deputy Manager operations for one of our client based out of Navi Mumbai. Below is the JD.


Education: Bachelors Degree (Graduate).

Experience :

• Graduate with minimum of 8 to 10 year of work experience in an International Voice Program from

• premium contact centres.

• Minimum 5 years of work experience in an International Voice Program, With minimum of 3

• years as an operations manager

• Prior experience in BFSI is mandatory.

• In-depth understanding of Operations Metric, People Practices (score calculations, parameter

• Ratings, Attrition calculation, Situation Handling etc.).

• • Customer service oriented. Should have prior knowledge of customer care processes and

• Techniques.

• •Proficient in MS Office — Excel, Word and Powerpoint and possess knowledge of GreenBelt,

• Lean, Scheduling etc

Job Description

• Roles & Responsibilities –

They will also be responsible for the training and development of their staff members, assisting in vacation planning and coverage during operator outages, and managing email inquiries received through the team’s escalation inbox. Team Leads will also be the first point of escalation for their staff. They will communicate directly with the on-site SME team (Delivery Assurance) to develop and implement corrective action plans for poor operator performance and solution complex investigations/wire inquiries/escalations.

Core Process Activities -

• Understanding of the scope of Transaction, knowing when to escalate items that appear out of the norm and when to pass inquires on to other investigative units.

• Strong people management skills, Sets high standards and understands the developments needs of their team

• Ability to develop, deliver and report on the efficacy of their training plans for their staff

• Strong level of understanding of metrics/reporting to be able to review any issues that operators raise

• Responsible for ensuring timely, complete and accurate processing of transactions (including performing all relevant controls) within own area of responsibility

• Ensures timely & effective escalation of operational and other risks to management

• Provides direction, support and guidance to direct reports and functional teams within own area of responsibility to create and foster an environment of continuous improvement. Review Trends and eliminate manual touchpoints where appropriate

• Supports tough people decisions to ensure people performance is aligned with organization standards. Manages individual performance issues, where necessary, to drive for high performance.

• Strive to be the best for our client’s needs. Manage change effectively

• Delivers results as per Service Level Agreement always. Ensure service quality and ensure agreed KPI’s are delivered. Understand customer requirements.

• Regular Ageing analysis and pro-active and relevant updates provided to Client

• Check team members Message workbasket & Work basket at EOD to ensure that all messages and cases have been actioned upon Co-ordinate with other departments both internal and external to help resolve customer query. Review out of standard resolved queries to avoid re-occurring issues to avoid client complaints –

• Identifying process Risks and suggesting suitable controls, with immediate escalation to management

• Review Team Re-open cases and do a root cause analysis.

• Collating required data for analysis.

• Raise awareness of System issues and errors (including impact) to respective teams and Client.

• Check staffing for the day and & update leave tracker with the staff schedule and ensure sufficient staffing levels are maintained during holidays.

• Check productivity of all the team members - Ensure resolution expectancy is adhered to

• Notify and ensure security administration within 24 hours for deletion of all IDs of employees no longer working in the unit.

• Ensure all Deliverables are met timely on time.

• Continuous monitoring of queue volumes, and work load distribution. Cases to be actioned for absent members and distributed within the team for action.

• File review to be done & scores to be shared via team meetings and Remote team updating on weekly MIS call

• Individual feedback provided for File review findings, escalations received, Error trackers etc.

• Ensure that all mail queries from the mailbox and escalation drop or respective team have been addressed (Evidenced via shift handover email)

• Creating and regular review process – Engage with relevant Stakeholders to improve robotics.

• Ensure Risk review is completed for the respective Team.

• Ensure that team members have taken action cases which are highlighted on the SLA report as scheduled to be untimley in next 24hours

• Review of Leave Tracker to identify any staff who have recorded >4 instances of absence. Assess if potential disciplinary action will be enforced and advise unit manager accordingly.

• Meet required productivity metrics set for the team.

• Ensure tracking, accurate and timely resolutions of issues and exception raised

• Adhere to internal policies to ensure compliance with legal parameters as well as company policies and procedures

• Daily huddles, monthly documented QCM’s, contribute to Team Meetings and effectively manage team expectations Implement Strong Controls to avoid any mishandling of processes to avoid any reputation risks for franchise Ensure all process changes are communicated and managed closely

• Other Activities –

• Ensure password is changed on all systems / applications frequently.

• Ensure all the InfoSec policies are adhered to.

• Flexibility to work according to the Business hours/During weekends (if required)

• Willing to work in rotational shifts (Night shift – as and when required)

• Comprehend customers queries / complains / comments

• Provide quick and effective resolution to the customer's queries

• Ability to manage work efficiently with minimum guidance

• Is able to communicate clearly, both written and in speech

• Should be willing to take quality Feedback and show improvements in the upcoming reviews.

• Should be a quick Learner and Team player.

• Adherence to all Mandatory Trainings/Leaves (Both Client and company) for self and Team.

• Should complete Monthly Process Knowledge assessments successfully.

• Should be willing to participate in adhoc Production Validation Testing or UAT as required.

title: Team Leader
tagsAndSkills: Team Handling,Customer Service,SLA Management,Team,SLA,Management,Team leading,Handling
jobDescription:
We are hiring Team Leader for one of our client based out of Navi Mumbai.


Education

Mandatory: Graduates from any stream or Global Equivalent degree

Desirable: NA

Experience

  • Minimum 2-year experience as a Team Leader in International voice process
  • Minimum of 5 year of work experience in an International Voice Program from premium contact centers

Technical Competencies: (Job related)

  • Proficient in MS Office Excel, Word and Powerpoint and possess knowledge of GreenBelt, Lean, Scheduling etc
  • Sound Knowledge of monitoring and reporting tools such as Avaya CMS, Aspect, Verint WFO and BI Tools
  • Should be aware of Ecommerce industry and should have used it in daily professional life
  • Usage Experience of E Wallets like (Paytm / Momikwik / PhonePE) and have functional knowledge of the product.

Soft Skills:

  • Ensures adherence to contractual SLAs and manages the overall workflow within the team
  • Analyses existing work practices (system and procedural) – identifies and implements changes in areas of improvement.
  • Maintains Customer Centricity at all times in managing queues, resolving issues & queries.
  • Handles all team issues, (e.g. People Management, Conflict Resolution and Administrative).
  • Is responsible for ensuring Quality Controls and Checks are being carried out effectively
  • Focuses on all around development of SMEs and team members (Mentoring & Grooming) along with performance management
  • Facilitates liaison with clients to resolve issues and bridge Knowledge Gaps
  • Conducts regular feedback sessions with Team Members.
  • Is responsible for carrying out appraisals of Team Members
  • Ensures Process Improvement activities are carried out on an ongoing basis and on time
  • Management & communication of system issues/outages to stakeholders
  • Change request management and follow up till closure

Others

  • Adherence to company policies, rules and regulations
  • To follow quality processes thoroughly using checklist standards
  • Communicate company vision, mission, and goals. Ensure complete alignment of the functional / service line teams to overall company objectives
  • Champion Hexaware culture by role modeling behaviors
  • Create a work environment that nurtures and supports diversity and has an inclusive work culture
  • Ensure productive work relationships are established with all relevant internal functions
  • Ensure data confidentiality, integrity and protection of company's intellectual property
  • Responsible for complying with all QMS and ISMS Policies and procedures

Mandatory:

  • Experience in a BFSI account is mandatory
  • Should express excellent leadership qualities and spearhead the team
  • Excellent English verbal communication skills enabling client expectation management
  • Should be ready to work in flexible shifts, Rotating Day and Night with 6 days working,

Desirable:

  • Leadership / People Management skills
  • Strong problem solving skills
  • Good communication skills (verbal & written English)
  • High level of initiative
  • Analytical and Investigation skills
  • Ability to organize and prioritize work
  • Coaching skills

title: Business Finance Manager
tagsAndSkills: Business Finance Manager,loss,Advance excel,data analytics,P&L,Budget Management,Financial Planning,financial modelling
jobDescription:
Urgently Looking For Business Finance Manager for Banking Domain.

Position-Business Finance Manager.

Work Location- Juinagar, Navi Mumbai.

Experience- 2+ Years

Notice Period- Immediate to 30 days Serving.

Job Description-

1) Preparation of monthly P&L to analyse profit making and loss making division

2) Preparing meaningful outputs from the available resources and providing variance analysis

3) Preparing daily/ weekly & monthly snapshot for top management

4) Coordinating at company level financial planning and budget management function.

5) Undertaking peer comparisons with respect to business model and financials

6) Assisting in preparation of investor presentations for quarterly/ annual board meetings

7) Exposure in creating financial models in excel using advanced tools like macros and look up features

8) Experience in creating key financial data to provide insights to influence strategic decisions via data analytics, financial modelling and industry/business analyses.


* Looking for candidate who can join within immediate or 30 Days Serving.


Thanks & Regards,

vikram

HR Recruiter - Talent Acquisition

Talent Sketchers
